thoughtBubbles: Why is Swanage Town Council putting at risk the peace of our neighbourhood?
Swanage is more than just the 'Green Seafront'
Tourists desperately trying to find free parking down your streets
Congestion, impatience, hot summer weather, lots of junctions, lots of cars all trying to park, drop off, transit through residential streets = WE are the ones that stand for pedestrian safety
Two-way traffic = we all win / one-way traffic or full road closure = only Swanage Town Council & their businesses win
